lender.name: Will & Jane
lender.loan_because: It helps others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve their Information Technology problems. Jane supports me in that task. I couldn't do it without her.

lender.name: Gary & Shelly
lender.loan_because: to help another
lender.occupational_info: gary is a death penalty defense attorney. shelly teaches elementary school.

lender.name: The Robison family
lender.loan_because: We wanted to start a family project that could grow over the years and last for many generations.
lender.occupational_info: Retiree, Teachers, Grandparents, Banker, Aircraft Mechanic, Homemaker, USMC pilot, Students, Doctor of Physical Therapy, Speech Language Pathologist, MBA- Blackhawk Logistics.

lender.name: Fuller Family
lender.loan_because: "How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." ~ Anne Frank

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: All entrepreneurs should be given the opportunity to empower themselves and succeed. The culture of collaboration is a powerful thing, and together we can do significant things that make a real difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the music industry. I work with artists to helping them manage and develop their careers, so they can share their gift with others.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help people better their lives and realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Cavalry Officer in the United States Army.

lender.name: Roswitha
lender.loan_because: together we can make the world a better place
lender.occupational_info: I work at an public authority. We support schools in order to help them participate in international cooperation initiatives.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: I spend a lot of time in developing countries, and I meet many people who work very hard in very challenging conditions. Kiva seems like a dignified and respectful way to help deserving people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I search for the bones of people who have died in wars. I help identify them so they can be returned to their families.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: It is a way to be involved with others outside of the community, extending, in a way to a global community.
lender.occupational_info: Nursing is pretty universal, but I am in the mental health field where I assist people dealing with depression, greif and losses in their lives.

lender.name: GIGI
lender.loan_because: I know that every penny counts and that these loans can change people's lives for the better.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life by helping them in business.

lender.name: Satoshi
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for my fortunate circumstance, and would like to lend a hand to someone in a different place in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a musical instrument company. I wish for all people everywhere to enjoy music.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: From those that are given much, much is expected!
lender.occupational_info: Whatever the business is, I help people make and execute their plans.

lender.name: Nazeer
lender.loan_because: Just hoping to make someone’s life better.. and wish to do more and more everyday…
lender.occupational_info: lend more and improve others life

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed to have all I have. It is my responsibility to help those less fortunate gain a life of dignity. I truely beleive that if everyone had the opportunity to live with safety, prosperity and hope the the world would be a much safer place.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I love the Lord

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I am the top finance manager in a large company that makes and sells mostly computers and supplies.

lender.name: Newton
lender.loan_because: I hope to help some so that they will not need to borrow again.
lender.occupational_info: Analyze and develop great tasting food products.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.occupation: Real Estate Assoc. Broker and Appraiser

lender.name: nata
lender.loan_because: Those who stare at the past have their backs turned to the future.

lender.name: Kumo
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have the good fortune to be able to do so.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: As a business owner I want to encourage entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I help match property sellers with investors. The vendor can sell their home and rent it back from the buyer so they do not have to leave their house. for USA properties visit www.rentback.org/sell_and_rent_back_USA.html I also run a small holiday business with my husband, see www.holiday-turkey.com for a vacation in Bodrum, Turkey and www.jetplane.co.uk for villa accomodation in the Costa Tropical, Spain.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.occupation: Founder of Teens In Touch, Inc.
lender.loan_because: Giving is one of the greatest gifts outside of Love.
lender.occupational_info: I am the founder of a non-profit organization, a realtor, and an editor for a publishing company, I have a heart to give and help others.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I get things done...

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Have been a big fan of micro-credit since reading Banker to the Poor about 10 years ago. Thrilled that I can do my small part!
lender.occupational_info: Selling garden ornamentation to independent retailers

lender.name: Mary Margaret
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Accounting

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I have had help in my life when I needed it and this enabled me to be able to go on to earn a good living and have a nice life. I want others to be able to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers. I also own a small apartment building and work constructions projects as well.

lender.name: Eugene
lender.loan_because: just trying to do my part.
lender.occupational_info: boring

lender.name: Caspar
lender.loan_because: Being a business owner myself, I like helping other business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I practice law.

lender.name: kathleen
lender.loan_because: I have been helped by many people and want to pay it forward.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: Giving back feels good. Living in America, I feel very fortunate to be able to utilize all the good fortunes that are bestowed upon us and that most of us take for granite. I feel that it is a privilege to give a small loan. "To whom much is given..much is required".
lender.occupational_info: I work with investments everyday and I understand the concept behind marketing. I know the importance of investing in one's dreams. I know that these loans make the difference between one's success and one's failure. I want to help everyone succeed!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: character counts and should be rewarded.
lender.occupational_info: I create an environment that is so friendly, so welcoming, so positive that people can't help but buy my wares!

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I loan because everyone needs a helping hand. I was able to complete my education because my life has benefited from government loans. I feel that helping others is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves studying how the body protects itself from germs and from cancer. As an immunologist, I work to find new ways to strengthen the body in its fight against disease.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I need to help. I loan aand it makes me feel better. I wish I could do more and I recommend this effort. Robert
lender.occupational_info: I worked at a Nuclear power plant for most of my life but am retired now. I served in the Army in Vietnam.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to help other's dreams come true--especially at such a small cost to me.
lender.occupational_info: I coach football (American football) at a major university. My job includes not just coaching but helping young men reach their educational goals and athletic goals.

lender.name: Amani
lender.loan_because: 100% of my funds go directly to the entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a local art museum.

lender.name: Hashi-Hanta
lender.loan_because: I have struggled in my life and now am happy to be able to help someone else. Whenever I loan, I feel that across the world I have made a new friend. A wonderful feeling!
lender.occupational_info: I live on an Indian reservation, where half of our people still have dirt floors and no inside running water. I am an author, now working on children's books.

lender.name: Sadie
lender.loan_because: ...There, but for the Grace of God, go I.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: it's fun! Plus, it's a very sustainable model and I enjoy the community aspect of this site. Kiva lenders are some of the coolest people you'll ever meet ;-)
lender.occupational_info: Kiva addict

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Akshay
lender.loan_because: I want to see people happy...
lender.occupational_info: I make computers intelligent

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: There are people who have less and need more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I study Physics at the University of Illinois. When I graduate I may become a high school physics teacher or a scientist.

lender.name: Elke
lender.loan_because: I support individuals who want to achieve the best they can with the situations they encounter, and hopefully my small efforts will make a difference.

lender.name: Sharron
lender.loan_because: I hope what little I can do will help make someone a little happier, and have more hope.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to help themselves. I am a small business owner myself and i realize the struggles that can come along with that responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: My full time job is training employees for the compnay I work for. I also own my own business selling women's fishing clothing and accessories.

lender.name: Dony
lender.loan_because: We are our brothers keeper. It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired, worked hard all my life in a steel mill. Now able to help others.

lender.name: Benoit
lender.loan_because: It's a way of helping to those who are trying to help themselves. I know it's going to someone that is trying to better their lives and the lives of their family.
lender.occupational_info: I have two jobs, I write computer programs, and I'm also an artist.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed
lender.occupational_info: Grateful to be me and hopeful others find peace and success.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: I love making money off interest payments.
lender.occupational_info: Getting my MSW. Hopefully you will hire me next summer!

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I am a member of Just Faith which is looking for ways to make our faith come alive. We have chosen the obliteration of poverty as our purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I work to resolve conflicts and to help others see hope when they feel like there is no chance for resolution.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I someday want to own my own business. I think it is great that people out there want to give to the community.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Champlain College Class
lender.occupational_info: I'm very proud of my MGT120 students, who raised money as part of an entrepreneurship course, to help other entrepreneurs. Three years later, that fund raising is still making a difference, as we near our 60th loan. Champlain College is located in Burlington, VT.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: "Because the world owes me nothing....We owe each other the world." --Ani Di Franco
lender.occupational_info: If someone needs a building, they describe their needs to me and I ask important questions to make sure various functions are grouped appropriately. I sketch a preliminary design that fits the budget, and get the owner's approval for it. Then I give builders detailed instructions on how to construct spaces for these specific uses. The instructions consist of drawings, contracts, and lists of materials and products they must incorporate. Sometimes I pay others to help me with complicated systems such as lighting, indoor air quality, or various types of engineering. I also inspect the work for quality as it goes up, and I have the authority to order corrections at the builder's expense. If anything is wrong with my instructions, I am responsible for the cost of repair or injury. I make dreams come true!

lender.name: Amit Garg
lender.loan_because: I believe in self-sustainability
lender.occupational_info: continue building a career at the intersection of medicine and technology, to fulfill a need in the world

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I would like to see everyone make a goal and reach it in their life and succeed. I have been very blessed and would like to help other reach their goal(s), regardless of race, ethics, creed, or religion.
lender.occupational_info: My title is Designer, Electrical Substation. I draw the plans to build the foundations, structures, and any physical parts of the electrical substation. I have been doing this for 34 years at the same company.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: As a follower of Jesus Christ, I see helping the poor as an integral responsibility and rewarding opportunity to change a life. It is amazing the impact a few dollars can have in rescuing someone for a life of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure people receive the correct medications to help them get well and stay well. When I'm not doing that, I work on repairing old houses.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and my family, and we want to bless others.

lender.name: charles
lender.loan_because: I wish to share my good fortune with others
lender.occupational_info: Mostly a desk job reviewing contracts and solving problems

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: This is my way of giving to others from the wealth of gifts and opportunities I have received living here in the US. I was taught that "to whom much is given, much will be expected." Though I am not wealthy, I am able to share some of what I make. And I can see that I can make a difference in someone else's life with just a small gift.
lender.occupational_info: I do legal work under an attorney;s suprevision.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: my small change can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: i build graphics for computer training courses, i make business cards, brochures, web sites, anything that needs design.

lender.name: Kate
lender.occupation: Soon to be small business owner

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: I want to help individual's make their lives better so they can help make the world better for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Being Office Manager of a video game development company can hardly be called a job due to the great people and fun environment!

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others and spreading the Good News of Jesus.

lender.name: Suresh
lender.loan_because: I am looking for ways to give back communities to help build a better world for coming generations.

lender.name: JP
lender.loan_because: I believe in people....some need a little help to make their dreams come true. It's fun to help other.
lender.occupational_info: When I was working my partner and I ran a medical practice helping people with AIDS. I also owned a hotel in Fort Lauderdale and sold it in 2005 to escape the hurricanes. I now live in stress free Tucson, Arizona. I only hope that each loan given brings a better life for someone and their loved ones.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others as I have been helped in my life as an entrepreneur.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to help someone better his/her life. How could I not?
lender.occupational_info: Helping others to learn the global language of English.

lender.name: Mary Ellen
lender.loan_because: It gives me a sense of action in a world of much need and more complaining. I feel I am doing something to change.
lender.occupational_info: I tutor one-to-one young adults as they move through high school and prepare for college. We work on writing and English language use.

lender.name: Suzanne, Greg & Ted
lender.loan_because: When I was a college student, I studied East Africa and came to the conclusion that if the individual people of Africa had a bit of money they would gladly help themselves. Thanks, Kiva for fulfilling my dream of helping individual peope help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant. My husband Greg is a geologist working on water pipe construction. Ted is a Chemical Engineer working in the California wine industry.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed. If you give you will be rewarded 1000 times more through fulfillment.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: We are all part of a global economy, an international community that is reliant upon each other for survival.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: Global community micro-loans will change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories with pictures.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I love to help others. I feel good inside and I want them to feel as good as I do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a retail sports business. We sell clothing and shoes to schools and walk in customers. I also work free lance in drawing portraits in graphite.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Its a way to help.
lender.occupational_info: Believing in hope for a changing world.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in need and Kiva is an extremely effective way of dong just that.
lender.occupational_info: I represent taxpayers in negotiations with the government with respect to real estate taxes.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I can. After travelling around the world I realized how much disparity there is out there. A little help can go a long way. Everybody deserves a chance to earn a good living and to provide for their familiy with dignity and hardwork.

lender.name: Siobhan
lender.loan_because: I have very little by Western standards, but it is a fortune to some people. A small bit here and there is a little to me, but the world to soemone else. Kiva allows me to do what little I can at this point in my life, and I am thankfull.
lender.occupational_info: I study how to make seeds better. To make more nutritious, better quality seeds.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to achieve their goals.

lender.name: Andro Berkovic
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can - and I strongly believe one should make the difference, if one can. Words are cheap.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: life is about helping others

lender.name: Lee & Lori
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people who want to improve their lives through work and community
lender.occupational_info: We are involved in marketing computer chips and other electronic components

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It makes positive difference in someones life.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We help companies find qualified people to work for them.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: The strength of the world community is enhanced as each one of us shares to help others. Person helping person is the meaning of love and caring.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in hospitals as a social worker, and before that as a teacher. I am now retired and help others as a volunteer.

lender.name: marti
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help at sometime.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers in a hospital environment.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: i want to help people. i want to leave this planet better than i found it. and i truly believe in this model.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I believe that these entrepreneurs will help not only themselves, but others, because they will make their economy stronger.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Chartered Accountant and owner of a recycling business.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I had Kiva credit given to me as a gift
lender.occupational_info: I take classes and do research in clinical psychology and behavioral medicine.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: Just a small bit of money can impact another life profoundly

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: This seems like a good way to help people and make a real impact in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I write books for kids and teenagers.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It is gratifying to know that I can do something directly to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Over 100 years ago, my great grandfather started a small laundry business in Brooklyn and I have been the beneficiary of his hard work and motivation and I am very grateful for that.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to have all that I do. Not everyone has had as many opportunities as I have had and I want to share what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help small business operate better.

lender.name: Tess
lender.loan_because: There are others who need the opportunity and if I can help, all the better.
lender.occupational_info: Like herding cats....

lender.name: Julie
lender.occupational_info: French and history teacher

lender.name: Lucille
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance. I admire people who have the drive to make a living on their own. Kiva is a wonderful way for many people like me to help a little. When we all pull together, we help a lot.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired Letter Carrier for the United States Postal Service.

lender.name: capitalism -- ick!
lender.loan_because: As much as I detest capitalism microfinance seems to help reduce poverty so until I find a better cause I'll use kiva. I'd prefer to give the money to people but that doesn't seem to be an option.
lender.occupational_info: "And what about this new interest of his? The Workers' Revolutionary Vanguard? Is it really suitable do you think? With Sheridan's education and background surely he ought to be in the Executives' Revolutionary Vanguard."

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. This is a far more rewarding way for people to rise out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain financial records for my employer, prepare and file government required reports and pay the bills.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I have worked overseas a fair bit and want to give people in the countries I've been to some help
lender.occupational_info: I teach accountancy to students from many countries

lender.name: Kay and Greg
lender.loan_because: We have traveled extensively and meet lovely people that could so obviously benefit from just a little assistance. It is a pleasure to know we can help another entrepreneur!
lender.occupational_info: We own our own Environmental Consulting practice in Houston, Texas (Crouch Environmental Services, Inc.)

lender.name: Olimi
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that there is more than enough for us all in this world, let us share. That is how the human spirit works.
lender.occupational_info: I seek and develop businesss opportunities

lender.name: Jorge Ruiz
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to support entreprenuers

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I also was a widow and know the struggles of trying to keep a family together during very rough times.
lender.occupational_info: I would simply like to give back as people helped me work through my grief.

lender.name: Gregorio
lender.loan_because: God has blessed our family so that we can help people. :-)

lender.name: Carmelkeyboard
lender.loan_because: It's amazing what a little bit from many can accomplish.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: What if we all gave a little?

lender.name: jackie
lender.loan_because: there is no greater joy in life than giving to worthy causes.
lender.occupational_info: I help people help themselves.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I appreciate what God has done for me and Christ tells us that we show love for him by loving one another.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers for a living.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I engage in the practice of law in the United States.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: To know that I've helped someone reach a goal in their life.
lender.occupational_info: Assist individuals with computer and network issues.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.occupational_info: I tell people what moves and inspires me in the hope it will encourage them to take action and make a positive difference in their life and the lives of those they touch.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Sean & Tanya
lender.loan_because: We like to put some spare money to good use.
lender.occupational_info: In an office, on a computer. 40 hours a week.

lender.name: Gabi & Carlos
lender.loan_because: we want to empower a social entrepreneur in South America. Our higher purpose is to promote global interconnection of social justice and sustainability. Microcredits can certainly lead to economic independence.
lender.occupational_info: Gabi is of Paraguayan descent and Carlos is Argentinean. Gabi is finishing her master's of Business Administration in Sustainable Enterprise and has a degree in International Relations in Sustainable Development. Carlos is an independent contractor installing audio/video equipment. He was a DJ in his native country and has two sons in Cordoba, Argentina.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Microloans are such a great way to make a real difference in someones life for less than my weekly Starbucks bill. Although there is no real tax advantage to these loans, I sort of think of it as an investment in making the world a tiny bit better and hopefully that in of itself will be payback enough in the form of Karma.
lender.occupational_info: Without computers my company would not be able to operate in an effective way. We have a great bunch of people who spend their working day making sure that they all work as they are supposed to. My job is to figure out how to use them better and more effectively and get a bigger bang for our investment in technology.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I love the stories and I believe all hard workig people deserve an opportunity to uplift their families and communities. Many of these stories remind me of the people and place where I grew up. Thank you Kiva for making a way for so many.

lender.name: El Nora
lender.loan_because: It gives me great satisfaction to invest in someone else's dreams
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired & live comfortably...it's time to help others.............

lender.name: Danette
lender.occupational_info: I teach 5th graders.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it is important to give back when we have been given so much.

lender.name: Dr. Bruce
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving good people a chance to make it financially. I believe in capitalism.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to live better lives through mental health therapy, counseling, marriage counseling, substance abuse, and education.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am an investigator.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity through the internet to make a difference; Kiva allows me to help people all over the world.

lender.name: CreoleInDC
lender.loan_because: “For of those to whom much is given, much is required.” Bible (Luke 12:48)

lender.name: fred
lender.loan_because: I feel it is incumbent upon those of us that care and are able to do what we can. I also believe in helping good people to do better, and Kiva is a great resource to that end.

lender.name: EdS
lender.loan_because: Wow! This is great!
lender.occupational_info: I write small business automation applications.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: Paying forward the kindness that was shared with me.

lender.name: Robby
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone's life it keeps me from becoming cynical.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who are urgently ill or injured.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in arranging travel.

lender.name: Jeri and Steve
lender.loan_because: this is such a wonderful way to share our blessings across the world with deserving people!!
lender.occupational_info: My husband is a teacher and I am a graduate student.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro lending and appreciate the need of lending to allow persons an independence to be enterprising and preserve their dignity. They alone know what they are able to do they alone have the confidence in themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I use to be an auto mechanic and an instructor in automotive technology at the community college, because of an injury I am now retired disabled.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have been deployed to places where even a little bit of help made a big difference to the local population. I want to do this to help those same people get on their feet and start building a better future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Design student working my way into the arts. Former active duty Air Force and now serving in the Air Guard.

lender.name: Diego
lender.loan_because: giving to someone who has a dream makes me feel like I'm doing something to help out.

lender.name: BettyJean
lender.loan_because: No one can do everything but everyone can do something!
lender.occupational_info: I started my own business online and I want others to have that opportunity too!

lender.name: Trischa
lender.loan_because: I can. I'd rather help individuals than organizations and bureaucracy.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. I have traveled to out of the way places around the world and it only helps me to realize how fortunate I am.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse at a hospital in Boston.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because:
This is the best way to not only get 100% of my donation to the recipient, but I can also see the results of this action.
It's so much more personal than writing a check and never hearing back.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Biology teacher in Southeast North Carolina.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful way to get money into the hands of people who can then create a better life for themselves. I can't think of better way my few bucks can make more of a difference. Peace to all.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired so work is behind me. These days I garden, read, cook and do a little yoga.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a good job, a nice home and enough money to buy food and pay my bills. Others are not so fortunate but are willing to work hard and I'm happy to lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work with members of several Native American tribes to secure and pass on culture and history to the next generations.

lender.name: bonny
lender.loan_because: My children wanted to have their own businesses and they worked hard and we helped...now we can help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I believe that women are the ultimate peacemakers in the world! We must do all that we can to empower women to create fulfilling lives for themselves and their families, and in doing so, start a wave of peace and prosperity throughout the world. Every contribution of time, money or service is essential right now!
lender.occupational_info: I am an actress, singer and writer.

lender.name: Catherine, Loren & Sasha
lender.loan_because: because I have had a disproportionate share of good luck, because I want my son to live in a better world, because I admire the entrepreneurial spirit which I don't have!
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Federal Gvt. and help U.S. clean energy and environmental companies export.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: The world is small and we all belong to it. I want to help my fellow world citizens, even if in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom, wife and a student. I am studing to be an Earth/Science teacher. My husband is an aircraft mechanic.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: by improving another's situation, I am improving my own.
lender.occupational_info: I care for children and hope to teach them compassion, conservation and joy.

lender.name: Jeff&Ali
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others and hope to make a difference in other peoples lives.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: "You should give more than you receive." I don't remember where I first heard this quote, but I believe it with all my heart.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse working with bone marrow transplant patients.

lender.name: MERRI
lender.loan_because: I know my money will go to someone who needs it, rather than be spent on the organization itself. I like making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I enable companies to show their video on the web and on portable devices.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I am an incorrigible romantic, and I strongly believe in micro-lending, both as a simple financial tool to help others and a social justice instrument with quite wonderful cultural side-effects.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a mathematician.
Soy matemático, y trabajo para una universidad en los EEUU.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: This is one of the most fun and rewarding things I have ever done. I love seeing the pictures here on Kiva of people from around the world with dreams and hopes for their futures. Kiva lets me share those hopes, and see those dreams come true.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I represent the Monday Life Group of Eugene Baptist Church. We loan because they need it more than we do - for which we are grateful.
lender.occupational_info: We are a small church trying to follow Jesus.

lender.name: F Morton
lender.loan_because: I believe all persons are created equally and I want others to have the opportunities I have
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, but am a self-employed writer

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: people deserve a chance.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: The amounts are whatever you are comfortable with. It makes little difference to receive .24% from a bank or lending the same money to an organization with a good track record. 100% repayment is pretty good.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Mathematics at a secondary school of 2750 students in New Jersey. I have also taught in Colorado, New York, and in the Peace Corps in Ghana, West Africa.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: sometimes you just need a little help from a random stranger.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a government agency that oversees other government agencies to make sure they follow state and local tax laws.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: Poverty is the worst form of violence. -- Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Deborah
lender.occupational_info: I do presentations on how children's brains develop. If we all understand we can support all efforts and programs to provide all the love and wonderful experiences children need.

lender.name: Selena
lender.loan_because: I believe in noblesse oblige.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I'm a Christian (Quaker) and I believe in helping to alleviate poverty because it could just as easily be me or my family in difficult circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students to be journalists. I try to teach them the importance of sharing people's stories and exposing injustice and poverty. I want them to educate the world and eliminate ignorance.

lender.name: Alireza
lender.loan_because: What greater pleasure is there than helping a fellow human being that you've never met thousands of miles away. It's like magic. :-)

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I travel often and see there is a great need to help others -- it is the least we can do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to high school students and inspire them to learn about cultures other than their own.

lender.name: Elva
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed!!
lender.occupational_info: stay at home mom

lender.name: Mat
lender.loan_because: I really think that a sum of little actions will make the difference.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Just want to help those that are in need.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to do so. As someone who travels for a living, I like the idea of helping people from some of the countries I have visited.
lender.occupational_info: I market travel technology products to travel agents all over the Americas

lender.name: Jeffrey Chien
lender.loan_because: Provide someone with a dream. I want to be able to help someone else be successful in earning a living and providing for their families. It is the right thing to do!

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I believe in Sustainable Prosperity, and I know that we have the global economic resources for everyone to enjoy a high quality of life. Food, education, healthcare, housing and energy are all abundant renewable resources. We are confused about money and human cooperation.
lender.occupational_info: I am an inventor and entrepreneur, experimenting in the next global currency for rapid and sustainable economic development. Please visit my website and read my White Paper on Sustainable Prosperity at: http://www.dualcurrency.com/files/wpcomplete.pdf

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: to try and help people around the world and show that Americans care and that our government's global policy and actions do not necessarily reflect all Americans sense of justice, kindness and compassion.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who suffer from chronic kidney failure. I operate a dialysis machine that cleans and filters their blood since their kidneys no longer function.

lender.name: Carrie & Amir
lender.loan_because: It is vital to my well being to "give back" in as many ways as I can. I have been very fortunate in my life and want others to have opportunities and be taken care of as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse and my husband is a physician.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I understand what it is like to need a little help.. though never at a level as most of the people on here..
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student who is currently getting a degree in geology.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I Like helping people
lender.occupational_info: I work for the state owned bus company in Sydney Australia

lender.name: Juno and Sammy
lender.loan_because: This is the best form of stimulous package I can think of. On top of that, the cats just begged me to join. It's really hard to say no to them....
lender.occupational_info: As an archaeologist and an Emergency Medical Technician I spend my time trying to help both the living and the dead. This is just a really cool way to keep helping.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I would like to think I can make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my daughter ,and volunteer when I can.

lender.name: mitchell
lender.loan_because: It's hopefully going to really make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I love the Entrepreneurial spirit in people an feel this is the way to promote freedom
lender.occupational_info: Management and Technology Consultant

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: captain of tour/excursion vessels in boston,usa

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: why not
lender.occupational_info: on the cutting edge

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I can, and I think I should.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hotel company, managing projects with their computer systems.

lender.name: Sierra
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help to build the World Wide Web.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: The Burgess Family
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world" -Gandhi

lender.name: France
lender.loan_because: I want people in other countries to be able to do like me and open their own bussiness.
lender.occupational_info: I open my own school seven years ago with very little money . Even in a country like Canada opening a bussiness for a single women is difficult. I can't imagine what it is for people in developping countries.

lender.name: Marlee & Samantha
lender.loan_because: Our mom showed us this site and we picked the businesses we wanted to help.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: You just know you are having a positive impact on someone's life who is less fortunate than you are. One person helping another person on the other side of the world. It's part of "giving back".
lender.occupational_info: I help lead a company that provides apartment housing to mainly low and middle income families in the southern U.S.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I care and I can help.

lender.name: Juan & Mary
lender.loan_because: the world is indeed flat to quote Friedman. A microloan may have a huge impact on persons striiving to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We are both lawyers in our own law firm in California.

lender.name: Dave and Mary
lender.loan_because: We believe in the human spirit and the overall goodness of mankind as intended by the Creator.
lender.occupational_info: We own a music production and promotion company along with CD production. We help unknown artists share their music with the world.

lender.name: milly
lender.loan_because: i lend because i believe it's something i should do.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I have travelled all over the world and appreciate how hard it is to make a living for people without capital. Loaning is easy and painless.
lender.occupational_info: Graphic Designer for a large PR firm. I work remotely from rural Wiscosin and Palm Springs, CA.

lender.name: David Sunfellow
lender.loan_because: To help as many people as possible reach their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: Visit the website linked below.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: Because they need stuff.
lender.occupational_info: I am 7 years old and in school.

lender.name: David Traver
lender.occupational_info: I am a disability lawyer in the United States. A disability lawyer works to win a subsistence living for those who cannot work due to their disabilities. Due to America's antiquated and inefficient disability adjudication system, thousands have been improperly denied basic subsistence and health care. Disability advocacy is an interesting profession, which gives me the opportunity to meet many disabled and disadvantaged people and to work for many of them. Hopefully, I help move things in the direction of goodness for those in need.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege to reach out across the world and help someone improve their life and that of their community.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: change starts with me. I hope through Kiva I can learn to be more generous - more Christlike - and experience the joys of giving. I want to affect this world in some small, significant, positive way.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepeneurship and dedication of people starting or running their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Office Manager for a commercial real estate company in Phoenix, Arizona, USA

lender.name: Frans
lender.loan_because: Prosperity is the best antidote to fundamentalism. Loans can help build individual prosperity while preserving self-respect.
lender.occupational_info: I design stuff. Currently I'm designing software and a 10 story educational facility for kids (2 different projects.)

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I wish to send a message that, contrary to the example set by the current US government, most people in the US are decent, caring individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I design automation systems for production (manufacturing) equipment.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I can afford to do this!
lender.occupational_info: I help people with legal matters before the Courts of the United States.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It seems the most effective way for helping people out.
lender.occupational_info: Retired Canadian Naval Officer

lender.name: carl
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Like a Postman

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Every person can make a difference.

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: I am 51 and one of my revelations in life is to realize that life is not about ME, but about WE. In the words of the Mahalia Jackson song...You may not be an angel and you may not go to church. As you do for yourself, you can do for somebody else...and it don't cost very much.

lender.name: Starretts & Tuttles
lender.loan_because: Our family would like to directly help those in need across the world. We are happy to help someone who is working hard to better their life and that of their family.
lender.occupational_info: We are all living and working in different parts of the world. Carolyn lives in Massachusetts, USA and is very involved in environmental issues. Terry and Heidi live in Montana, USA and run a computer shop. Pete, Tasha, Uvi and Zev live in Berlin, Germany. Pete is an actor and Tasha works in graphic arts. They are both busy teaching their children Uvi (6 yrs) and Zev (4 yrs) how to be good citizens of the world. Sandi (Carolyn, Terry and Pete's mother) lives in Massachusetts, USA. and is a retired teacher who is involved in numerous volunteer activities in her community.

lender.name: Ella, Haley, & Eric
lender.loan_because: Just trying to help a little.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: "If you give a man a fish he eats for a day if you teach a man to fish he eats for a lifetime." Perhaps with this small loan I am teaching someone to fish and then in turn send their children to school where they might also learn to fish.
lender.occupational_info: I am a working in a babies clothing store while I go to school to become a paramendic. (helping injuried people get to the hospital quickly)When I finish school I want to go out into the streets of my own community and help the people right here in my own back yard. However, I will never become so immersed in helping those close to home that I forget we are all connected as human beings. Everyone should have the right to the pursuit of happiness and until they do I will do my small part to improve their lives.

lender.name: Carla
lender.occupational_info: I teach women how to take care of themselves while they are pregnant, guide them through their birth and provide health care for their families.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by President Clinton.

lender.name: GeorgeS
lender.loan_because: My little bit can make a big difference in the hands of smart, hard-working people.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the US Air Force. I was an engineer, manager, and teacher. I now teach horseback riding and train horses. (The photo is of one of my horses, a Lipizzan gelding.)

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: Everyone who can, should.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in the developing world gain an economic foothold in their country's future. As the entrepreneurial class develops, the lessons they learn, the taxes they pay, and the growth they foster will help lift them from poverty. I want to see all children have access to decent health care, sufficient food, and the opportunity for education. I think I've been lucky to live where those things are possible, and want in some way, however small, to help others live a better life. All of us deserve a chance at life, a breath of freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I trade and sell sports memorabilia on line since becoming disabled. I try to stay politically active supporting progressive causes and candidates.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: It seems like a nice way to help people around the world
lender.occupational_info: I worked at the U.S. Social Security Administration for 37 years adjudicating foreign claims from around the world

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone an opportunity to gain independence and feel empowered to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lender.name: Tim and Kay
lender.loan_because: I always am wanting to help people but don't have a lot of money myself but by doing a small amount of money like $25.00 I can help someone. I myself just had to take a loan and the least I can do is spend $25.00 of it on someone in need. It just gives me peace with me being disabled to help in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: Kay is in bed in pain most of the time due to her back problems. Tim is the person who brings in the money for the family. He works making concrete bridge pieces. Of course, to someone across the world a bridge may not even be known and in that case the best I could say is that it is like a road made of a material called concrete that goes over land or water that needs a way over that goes in the air.

lender.name: Kristen Beck
lender.occupation: Writer, Educator, Mental Health Service Provider
lender.loan_because: The best way to change the world is to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people have a happier life.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Help when you can. Call it karma, or the golden rule or whatever you want. Good people want to help. It's that simple.
lender.occupational_info: I program the software that runs the computer chip inside a tape drive. It's 100 % peaceful, thank god, I don't have to build bombs or anything military.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to afford to help others. Micro Loans seem like they live by the old adage of "teaching a man to fish."
lender.occupational_info: Full time college student working for a non-profit student services organization doing web development.

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life and I'd like to pass that on.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: to whom much has been given, much is required

lender.name: connie
lender.loan_because: We can keep using the same monies over again and it is just a great idea. And it is something the average American can do.

lender.name: mjw
lender.loan_because: it helps me remember what is important in life
lender.occupational_info: unemployed wastrel

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: This money won't do much good sitting in a bank.

lender.name: JAMES
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Naudia
lender.loan_because: I have had many opportunities in my life and am very fortunate. I want to support honest and hard working people trying to make better lives for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: Everyone wants the dignity and respect that comes with the ability to take care of your family through work. It's a great feeling that will spread throughout & benefit the entire community!
lender.occupational_info: We process stable waste to make compost, topsoil & mulch. We sell to landscapers & gardeners. We are able to divert horse manure from the landfills and as a result of our products, see beautiful, lush green landscaping in our communities.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop interfaces for software that other engineers will use to help design and analyze things that we use each day.

lender.name: Ilda
lender.loan_because: I wanted to do my part to spread a little good in the world

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because:
I sincerely believe in the power of one. One individual. One decision. One to One change on a global scale. Think Global Act Local.
"The curse of poverty has no justification in our age. It is socially as cruel and blind as the practice of cannibalism at the dawn of civilization, when men ate each other because they had not yet learned to take food from the soil or to consume the abundant animal life around them. The time has come for us to civilize ourselves by the total, direct and immediate abolition of poverty."
- Martin Luther King, Jr.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: Not enough is done to improve the life of those in the world who are less fortunate that we are. If such loans improves the lives of the recipents then it is our duty to provide the funds to help!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a 2.2 meter telescope on the mountain Mauna Kea on the Big Island of Hawaii. I also research how stars like our sun form and evolve.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I learned about Microfinance from a press conference held by Bill and Melinda Gates and Warren Buffet. I wanted to participate in making funds available to people that wanted to make life better for themselves and their communities. I learned about Kiva.org through the Clinton Global Initiative.

lender.name: Kathryn & Michael
lender.loan_because: I want reach out and help people that are truly in need
lender.occupational_info: I maintain phone service for the local transit authority

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I care to help people who are making an effort to help themselves to better their lives.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: This is a beautiful thing. I want my son to grow up feeling he can make a difference in his world. Our little family has been blessed and we want to bless others.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: people helped me out in times of need in my past and want to give some of that help back. I also like the fact that it is a loan and not just a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I answer the telephone and answer questions or solve problems for the customers of the company I work for.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and help people who are less blessed than I. It is important to me to help someone who in turn will help another. I want to be the catlyst of a cacade of good will..
lender.occupational_info: I retired from regular employment and now only work part time and inspect homes and businesses for insurance companies. I identify risks and issues that allow people to improve their homes and businesses and get lower insurance rates.

lender.name: MARYSAM
lender.loan_because: it feels great making a difference to someone's LIFE....

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: To give a helping hand to those who wish to work for a better life for themselves or others.

lender.name: nono
lender.loan_because: I want to give people in the third world a chance to improve their current live-situation
lender.occupational_info: I'm responsible for logistic projects and special tasks

lender.name: Kath
lender.whereabouts: Belmont very rural New York State

lender.name: amie
lender.occupational_info: am working in a micro finance company. as a loan officer my main job is to give out loans

lender.name: Ronald Yuan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Everyone has dreams and goals in there life. But sometimes those goals are put on hold because the money runs thin. We all would love some help to meet those goals. There have been people that helped me move forward. I would like to return the favor and give to those who need that same help.
lender.occupational_info: Military

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I just read a newspaper article stating that Australia is the 8th richest nation on earth today. It's time to share some of that around.

lender.name: Elmerna
lender.loan_because: I believe God wants me to share with the poor of this world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a voluntary teacher of English as a Second Language

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I can - and for that I am both fortunate and grateful.

lender.name: Jon
lender.occupational_info: I work with actors, writers, and directors in film, television, and theater

lender.name: Roger Fraley
lender.loan_because: I feel that I have a responsibility to help and microcredit is an important tool of development and empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: I build high quality Marinas and Waterfront Residential developments. I also build floating houses.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: sally
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives me hope. It answers YES!!! to all the important questions i.e. Do dreams come true? Are humans inherently good? do we add to the blessings of life on our planet by sharing iin its joy and love and miracles? Is there a way that humans can use the good in us to sustain our species on the planet? In otherwards, can we truly help ourselves and each other without greed or envy? Are we basicly loving, joyful beings? ye yes yes I am so grateful for this organization. thank you for offering so much hope.
lender.occupational_info: I wrie book about the magic and mysteries of life for small children. i am also writing a book for all ages about the relationship that each one of us has experienced with individual trees in our life called Treestories. As a realtor, I help people find a home that is right for them in price, personality, family need, location and energy.

lender.name: Jeremey
lender.loan_because: I saw a PBS program about Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I live in England, lived in Toronto, but Embro is my home.

lender.name: Rebekka
lender.loan_because: The money I got for my Baptism can be used by others until I am 16
lender.occupational_info: Easy Peasy: sleep, eat, play

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I would like to leave a better world for my children and grandchildren.
lender.occupational_info: I archive oceanographic data.

lender.name: Ilene
lender.loan_because: I want to do something to help people who want to help themselves but can not do it on their own.
lender.occupational_info: I assist new businesses in creating a business image (logos, websites, business cards, etc.), and in getting their businesses and procedures organized and streamlined.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-lending to help people get a leg up in supporting themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I have been an educator for 28 years. I am now retiring and hope to do more in the world to make a difference.

lender.name: Glenn & Debbie
lender.loan_because: The Lord has been very good to us with bountiful blessings and we want to share with our brothers and sisters around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Debbie is a nurse caring for the elderly through Hospice Glenn is an engineer for companies providing oil and gas to the nation

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: if everyone helps a little, we have the power to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.

lender.name: Mia and Julius
lender.loan_because: we want to help with a hand up rather than a hand out.

lender.name: Cregg
lender.loan_because: I'm teaching Economics to high school students and demonstrating how entrepreneurship can not only lead people out of poverty but also provide vital goods and services to others in need.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching American teenagers with good hearts, but a lot of misplaced priorities.

lender.name: Nadine & Cameron
lender.loan_because: We are blessed in many ways, and try to give some of it back, participating fully in life. Kiva gives us the opportunity to impact others' lives in a very direct way, and we count this as an additional blessing.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: Its good to be good
lender.occupational_info: Creative intensity. Ink on paper.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: "Bert" my doggie told me to
lender.occupational_info: I have a marketing business.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I believe we are blessed to be a blessing to somebody else.
lender.occupational_info: I help market some of my company's products on the internet.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: it gives people an opportunity to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am finishing my graduate studies in finance. During the day I work for a medical device company.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a fair chance in this world of plenty.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because:

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: The joy I receive in being able to help others realize their dreams.

lender.name: gay
lender.loan_because: Want to help people be independant.
lender.occupational_info: Buy and sell collectiables.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: We get from life what we give. Love is giving without expecting anything in return. Love in ECK...Dan

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a loving family and a great career. Someone was always there when I needed help. I would like to do the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math to jr high students.

lender.name: Thomasina
lender.loan_because: Because I believe when someone is given a chance they can make a difference in their life and the lives of others!
lender.occupational_info: I own my own consulting company. Our mission: Empower Women.

lender.name: shahrad
lender.loan_because: I have a great desire to help another human being far from home and fight against global poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I have finished medical school and I'm currently studying to get my specialty in family medicine.

lender.name: Michael & Lisa
lender.loan_because: We feel fortunate to have what we have, and we like the idea of helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Michael maintains computers at a state college. I am an animal communicator and psychic/medium.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: giving a little can mean so much on the path for someone realizing their dream.

lender.name: loretta
lender.occupation: registered nurse in New York City

lender.name: Jonathan Morrone
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that a small contribution, combined with other lenders, can make an enormous economic difference in various pockets of the world. When people become self sufficent and productive, they are less inclined to particpate in acts of violence and terrorism.
